content:
Tady není žádná "zjišťovna". Je potřeba dodat informace. Co se stalo, než to přestalo fungovat? Je u toho nějaká chybová hláška? Funguje poštovní server (není chyba u odesílatele, či na serveru)?

creator: davidsk

content: It needs to appear 'local' to Thunderbird. You can easily test this by - exiting thunerbird - copying the imapmail\<account> to your cloud folder that has a drive allocation - start thunderbird, click account settings and on 'serversettings' pane, change the link to account folder to the cloud folder - thunderbird will close and restart. check and see if all is ok . if so, you can remove the folder on hard drive.
creator: davidsk
